feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-07-21T13:52:24.696129Z; ; ; ; ;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;显示 HN：Primo – 带有 Svelte 块、代码编辑器和 SSG 的可视化 CMS</stitle>; <id>;https://primocms.org</id>; <更新>;2023-07-21T12:5 0:14.527712Z</updated>; <link href="https://primocms.org"/>; <author>; <name>;mmmateo</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mmmateo</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://kdtzsoeklezpgshpzqtf.supabase.co/storage/v1/object/public/images/7c 1dc1a3-c9eb-4364-b31b-951ecfc2641d/1682111950401Screen%20Shot%202023-04-21%20at%205.17.27%20PM.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：122px；" />;<br />;邀请任意数量的协作者作为开发人员或内容编辑者，并一起编辑您的页面。在单个服务器上创建无限数量的网站并在几秒钟内启动新网站。将您的站点部署到 Github 存储库。从那里您可以轻松地将其部署到任何网络主机。使用 Primo 的免费主题之一开始运行，并使用 CSS 变量在几秒钟内对其进行自定义。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-primo-a-visual-cms-with-svelte-blocks-a-code-editor-and-ssg" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36813086" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry ry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;我用 Rust 编写了一个 JVM</stitle>; <id>;https://andreabergia.com/blog/2023/07/i-have-writing-a-jvm-in-rust/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T08:50:14.667133Z</updated>; <link href="https://and reabergia.com/blog/2023/07/i-have-writing-a-jvm-in-rust/"/>; <author>; <name>;lukastyrychtr</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=lukastyrychtr</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://andreabergia.com/images/2023/07/gc1.png" 样式=“宽度：220像素；高度：103像素；” />;<br />;我用 Rust 编写了一个 Java 虚拟机，称为 rjvm。它是一个出于学习目的而构建的玩具 JVM，而不是一个严肃的实现。它支持执行字节码指令、处理局部变量和堆栈元素以及调用方法。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#i-have-writing-a-jvm-in-rust" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36811554" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;大型强子对撞机内部三重态磁铁的淬灭导致小泄漏，造成严重后果</stitle>; <id>;https://home.cern/news/news/accelerators/accelerator-report-quench-lhc-inner-triplet-magnet-causes-small-leak-major</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T07:50:14.668855Z</updated>; <link href="https://home.cern/news/news/accelerators/accelerator-report-quench-lhc-inner-triplet-magnet-causes-small-leak-major"/>; <author>; <name>;untilted</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=untilted</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cds.cern.ch/images/CE RN-HOMEWEB-PHO-2023-098-1/file?size=large" style="宽度：220px；高度：165px；" />;<br />;由于电扰动，大型强子对撞机光束在碰撞仅 9 分钟后就被倾倒了。包括内部三重态磁体在内的几个超导磁体被淬灭，低温电路和绝缘真空之间出现小泄漏。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#quench-of-lhc-inner-triplet-magnet-causes-a-small-leak-with-major-consequences" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36811018" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <条目 xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Fly.io Postgres 集群已关闭 3 天，他们没有任何消息</stitle>; <id>;https://webcache.googleusercontent.com/search?q=cache:2T9NpG8thZgJ:https://community.fly.io/t/service-interruption-cant-destroy-machine-deploy-or-restart/1 42​​27&cd=9&hl=en&ct=clnk&gl=au</id>; <更新>;2023-07-20T23:50:14.670627Z</更新>; <link href="https://webcache.googleusercontent.com/search?q=cache:2T9NpG8thZgJ:https://community.fly.io/t/service-interruption-cant-destroy-machine-d eploy-or-restart/14227&cd=9&hl=en&ct=clnk&gl=au"/>; <author>; <name>;burnerbob</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=burnerbob</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://global.discourse-cdn.com/business7/uploads/fly1/original/2X/6/6 c0156ccc5696c58a720d8d900de3fd31ca2f109.png" style="宽度：220px; height: 109px;" />;<br />;Fly.io Postgres 集群已关闭 3 天，公司没有任何通信。用户无法重新启动或销毁已停止的机器实例，并且他们的应用程序和数据库遇到问题。人们对 Fly.io 缺乏信息和更新感到沮丧和担忧。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#fly-io-postgres-cluster-down-for-3-days-no-word-from-them-about -it" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36808296" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;能够看到专业知识是一个值得追求的里程碑（2022 年）</stitle>; <id >;https://commoncog.com/seeing-expertise-milestone-worth-aiming-for/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-21T07:50:14.671413Z</updated>; <link href="https://commoncog.com/seeing-expertise-milestone-worth-aiming-for/"/>; <作者>; <name>;nickwritesit </name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator。 com/user?id=nickwritesit</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://commoncog.com/content/images/2022/04/kl_judo_sankaku_class.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 165px;" />;<br />;专家比新手能看到更多的专业知识梯度，这使得新手很难理解为什么专家擅长他们所做的事情。这种缺乏理解也导致不同技能水平的自由职业者收取的费率存在差异。客户大多是新手，无法区分技能树高端的从业者，而专家可以。这意味着在达到一定的技能水平后，通过经验取得的任何改进都是看不见的给客户。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#ability-to-see-expertise-is-a-milestone-worth-aiming-for-2022" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36784864" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;纸飞机想法和技巧</stitle>; <id>;https://www.foldnfly.com/runway.php</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T09:50:14.672257Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.foldnfly.com/runway.php"/>; <author>; <name>;mottiden</name >; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mottiden</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.foldnfly.com/images/tips/ruler.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;跑道是一个关于最大限度地提高纸飞机性能的提示、技巧和想法的资源。它提供了有关精确折叠、对称、添加胶带或订书钉进行改进、调整质心、机翼设计、转向调整以及尝试不同纸张尺寸和类型的指导。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#paper-airplane-ideas-and-tips" target="_blank">;[summary ]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36784032" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Odin 的小乐趣</stitle>; <id>;http://www.zannzen.com/blog/small_joys_with_odin _1/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T10:50:14.673146Z</updated>; <link href="http://www.zannzen.com/blog/small_joys_with_odin_1/"/>; <author>; <name>;lerno</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=lerno</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Odin 是 C-就像面向数据且务实的语言。它是迄今为止经历过最少“wtf”的系统编程语言。 Odin 具有内置的生活质量功能，例如用于标志和数组编程的位集。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#small-joys-with-odin" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36812175" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题类型="text">;告诉 HN：立即升级您的 Metabase 安装</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/metabase/metabase/releases/tag/v0.46.6.1</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T10:50:14.674842Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/metabase/metabase/releases/tag/v0.46.6.1"/>; <author >; <name>;周通</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=zhoutong</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opengraph.githubassets.com/64d3f8f41e70c382db665523f561cba29dbc986ca723661bf2a8d12d9d362f46/met abase/metabase/releases/tag/v0.46.6.1" style="宽度：220px；高度：110px；" />;<br />;最近发现的安全漏洞几乎肯定会影响您，我们建议您立即升级元数据库安装。您可以下载该版本的 .jar，或者获取有关 Docker 的最新信息。请确保在升级之前备份您的元数据库数据库！需要帮忙？查看我们的升级说明。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#tell-hn-upgrade-your-metabase-installation-immediately" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36812256" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat .io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;纳秒时间戳冲突很常见</stitle>; <id>;https://www.evanjones.ca/nanosecond-collisions.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T07:50:14.677173Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.evanjones.ca/nanosecond-collisions.html"/>; <author>; <name>;ingve</ name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ingve</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;我写了一个小测试程序来比较 Go 中“绝对”时间和“单调时钟”记录的连续时间戳和绝对时间戳之间的相对差异。该行为取决于系统，在 Mac OS X 和 Linux 上观察到的结果不同。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#nanosecond-timestamp-collisions-are-common" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36810818" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;重新访问“Cansole”，因为我的电视没有合适的连接器</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.jgc.org/2023/07/revisiting-cansole-my-silly-pong-game.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T08:50:14.678018Z</updated>; <link href="https://blog.j gc.org/2023/07/revisiting-cansole-my-silly-pong-game.html"/>; <author>; <name>;jgrahamc</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jgrahamc</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/b/R29vZ2xl/AVvXsEinVS vft8sROXwwRAOm1kxwamwfS_9EbqjaU6oGxF7p6t8_Wu0BRijsJPLV9zXcPeEgVz_0Bc0rkpsC0soHcCHNniS9UXYFhkEVg_SOLYibzUZI21jDs7sl4rOcBf65Ceu_WIhr5J7GOhzQRdjcw89 7IGDletiPTPMt3BwWHRbWg-GGZfuwpc6XoQ/w640-h480/Untitled.002.jpg" style="宽度：220px; height: 165px;" />;<br />;早在 2011 年，Cansole 是一个罐装视频游戏机，它是使用 Arduino Pro、电阻器和来自 M&S 的甜罐子创建的。但是，作者最近发现他们的电视只有 HDMI 输入，因此他们订购了一个复合到 HDMI 转换器。Cansole 使用连接到 RCA 连接器的两个电阻器生成黑白复合视频图像。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#revisit ing-the-cansole-because-my-tv-doesn-t-have-the-right-connectors" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36783062" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题type="text">;数据泄露暴露了 4k Roblox 开发者的个人信息</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theverge.com/2023/7/21/23802742/roblox-data-breach-leak-developer-personal-information-expose</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T12:50:14.678831Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.th everge.com/2023/7/21/23802742/roblox-data-breach-leak-developer-personal-information-expose"/>; <author>; <name>;amalinovic</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=amalinovic</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://duet-cdn.vox-cdn.com/thumbor /0x0:2040x1360/2400x1600/filters:focal(1020x680:1021x681):format(webp)/cdn.vox-cdn.com/uploads/chorus_asset/file/24369733/STK146_Roblox.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;泄露的数据包含家庭住址、电话号码、出生日期，甚至 T 恤尺寸等敏感信息。在一次影响 Roblox 开发者会议与会者的数据泄露事件后，数千名 Roblox 创作者的敏感信息被曝光，据称该公司至少两年未披露该信息。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#data-breach-exposes-personal-information-of-4k -roblox-developers" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36812765" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;子像素距离变换</stitle>; <id>;https://acko. net/blog/subpixel-distance-transform/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T02:50:14.679677Z</updated>; <link href="https://acko.net/blog/subpixel-distance-transform/"/>; <author>; <name>;signa11</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=signa11</uri>; </author>; <content type="html ">;<img src="https://acko.net/files/esdt/cover.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;本文讨论了有符号距离场 (SDF) 在文本渲染中的使用。它解释了生成 SDF 的过程以及实现亚像素精度所面临的挑战。作者还描述了他们的项目 Use.GPU 中使用的一种新颖的亚像素精确距离变换 (ESDT)。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#sub-pixel-distance-transform" target="_blank">;[summary]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36809404" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;LLM Constellation</stitle>; <id>;https://llmconstellation.olafblitz.repl.co/</id>; <updated>;202 3-07-21T05:50:14.680467Z</更新>; <link href="https://llmconstellation.olafblitz.repl.co/"/>; <作者>; <name>;fzliu</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=fzliu</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#llm-constell化" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36810230" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;FedNow 上线</stitle>; <id>;https://www.federalreserve.gov/ newsevents/pressreleases/other20230720a.htm</id>; <更新>;2023-07-20T15:50:14.681497Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.federalreserve.gov/newsevents/pressreleases/other20230720a.htm"/>; <作者>; <name>;lavp</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycom binator.com/user?id=lavp</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.federalreserve.gov/images/social-media/social-default-image-opengraph.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 116px;" />;<br />;美联储宣布其新的即时支付系统 FedNow 服务现已上线。该工具允许银行和信用社为客户即时转账，使日常支付更快、更方便。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#fednow-is-live" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id= 36801491" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;秘密社团的邀请</stitle>; <id>;https://www.experimental-history.com/p/an-invitation-to-a-secret-society</id>; <更新>;2023-07-2 0T22:50:14.682420Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.experimental-history.com/p/an-invitation-to-a-secret-society"/>; <作者>; <name>;surprisetalk</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=surprisetalk</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn .com/image/fetch/w_120,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:好,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F548f103c-9c2a-4e20-aa3f-c0cec659b902_1194x1523.jpeg “样式=”宽度：220px; height: 281px;" />;<br />;我邀请每一位好奇的人去做科学并在互联网上分享。科学研究​​需要更多元的声音和想法。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#an-invitation-to-a-secret-society" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36807763" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;抛开好莱坞电影不谈，奥本海默到底有多优秀的物理学家？</stitle>; <id>;https://www.science.org/content/article/movie-adds-oppenheimer-s-celebrity-just-how-good-physicist-was-he </id>; <更新>;2023-07-20T23:50:14.683200Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.science.org/content/article/movie-adds-oppenheimer-s-celebrity-just-how-good-physicalist-was-he"/>; <作者>; <name>;andrewl</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=andrewl</ uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#hollywood-movie-aside-just-how-good-a-physicalist-was-oppenheimer" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36808001" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </条目>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Hipgnosis，改变唱片套的设计师</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theguardian.com/film/2023/jul/03/anton-corbijn-hipgnosis-film-pink-floyd-led-zeppelin</id>; <更新>;2023-07-21T01： 50:14.684072Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.theguardian.com/film/2023/jul/03/anton-corbijn-hipgnosis-film-pink-floyd-led-zeppelin"/>; <作者>; <name>;8bitsrule</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=8bitsrule</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;< img src="https://i.guim.co.uk/img/media/43bf707f76869042b60eb12f6a5f68427c96a378/1110_156_2557_2557/master/2557.jpg?width=120&dpr=1&s=none" style="宽度：220px;高度：220px;" />;<br />;以其摄影和音乐视频而闻名的安东·科尔宾 (Anton Corbijn) 执导了一部关于专辑封面设计先驱 Hipgnosis 唱片封套的纪录片。该纪录片采访了 Pink Floyd、Led Zeppelin 和 Paul McCartney 等乐队和艺术家，展示了 Hipgnosis 的创意和创意组合。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#hipgnosis-the-designers -who-changed-the-record-sleeve" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36797324" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Lit：简单、快速的 Web 组件</stitle>; <id>;https://lit.dev/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-20T21:50:14.685634Z</更新>; <link href="https://lit.dev/"/>; <作者>; <name>;tambourine_man</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=tambourine_man</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://lit.dev/图片/logo-whitebg-padded-1600x800.png" style="width: 220px; height: 111px;" />;<br />;Lit 组件是可在手写 HTML 或框架代码中使用的标准自定义元素。它们非常高效，并且每当反应性属性发生更改时都会重新渲染。Lit 可以轻松构建适合每个团队的 Web 组件。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#lit-simple-fast-web-components" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator. com/item?id=36806747" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;书中的校样</stitle>; <id>;https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proofs_from_THE_BOOK</id>; <更新>;2023-07-21T1 1:50:14.686461Z</updated>; <link href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proofs_from_THE_BOOK"/>; <作者>; <name>;a_imho</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=a_imho</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb /8/8a/Proofs_from_THE_BOOK_cover.jpg/220px-Proofs_from_THE_BOOK_cover.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 290px;" />;<br />;Proofs from THE BOOK 是 Martin Aigner 和 Günter M. Ziegler 所著的一本数学证明书。这本书献给数学家 Paul Erdős，他经常提到“这本书”，上帝在其中保存了每个数学定理最优雅的证明。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#proofs-from-the-book" target="_blank">;[summ ary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36812317" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;安藤百福发明方便面（2016）</stitle>; <id>;https://www.vox.com/201 5/3/5/8150929/momofuku-ando-ramen-instant-noodles</id>; <更新>;2023-07-21T00:50:14.687238Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.vox.com/2015/3/5/8150929/momofuku-ando-ramen-instant-noodles"/>; <作者>; <name>;thunderbong</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=thunderbong</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn.vox-cdn.com/thumbor/VrFvA9FXiEkez-eXQm17xdMoxpg=/0x0:2832x2121/1200x0/filters:focal(0 x0:2832x2121):no_upscale()/cdn.vox-cdn.com/uploads/chorus_asset/file/3470748/51791749.0.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 165px;" />;<br />;方便面的发明者安藤百福已成为各地美食家的英雄。方便面被评为日本 20 世纪顶级发明。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#momofuku-ando-invented-instant-ramen-2016" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36782487" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;研究发现微波加热容器时释放出数十亿纳米塑料</stitle>; <id>;https://news.unl.edu/newsrooms/today/article/nebraska -study-finds-billions-of-nano Plastics-released-when-microwaving/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-21T03:50:14.688367Z</updated>; <link href="https://news.unl.edu/newsrooms/today/article/nebraska-study-finds-billions-of-nano Plastics-released-when-microwaving /"/>; <author>; <name>;thunderbong</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=thunderbong</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://news.unl.edu/sites/default/files/styles/large_aspect/public/media/Hero_323.jpg?itok=VrSN38Hg" style="width: 220px;高度：124px;" />;<br />;微波塑料婴儿食品容器会释放大量塑料颗粒，包括每平方厘米容器数十亿个纳米塑料和数百万个微塑料。食用这些颗粒对健康的影响仍不清楚，但实验表明它们可能对肾细胞有毒。了解食物中塑料颗粒的数量并限制接触它们非常重要。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#study-find s-billions-of-nano Plastics-released-when-microwaving-containers" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36809565" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">; 21世纪论文中的17世纪字体</stitle>; <id>;https://www.linyangchen.com/Typography-Fell-Types-font</id>; <updated>;2023-07-20T21:50:14.689164Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.linyangchen.com/Typography-Fell-Types-font"/>; <author>; <name>;_e macsomancer_</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=_emacsomancer_</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://photos.smugmug.com/photos/i-G9xQbXV/0/X3/i-G9xQbXV-X3.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 266px;" />;<br />;作者在博士论文中讨论了他们对数字字体的不满以及对模拟凸版印刷的方法的探索。他们发现了 Fell 字体，这是 Caslon 所源自的原始字体的数字化版本，并在论文中使用了它。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-17th- century-font-in-a-21st- century-论文" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36807108" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;人文学者希望学生了解互联网的哪些内容</stitle>; <id>;https://computinged .wordpress.com/2023/07/17/what-humanities-scholars-want-students-to-know-about-the-internet-alternative-paths-for-alternative-endpoints/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-21T05:50:14.689977Z</更新>; <link href="https://computinged.wordpress.com/2023/0 7/17/what-humanities-scholars-want-students-to-know-about-the-internet-alternative-paths-for-alternative-endpoints/"/>; <author>; <name>;panic</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=panic</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://computinged.files.wordpress.com/202 3/07/draggedimage-10.png" style="width: 220px; height: 159px;" />;<br />;文科和理科教师希望学生了解有关互联网的基本概念，例如数据库和信息检索，而不是关注 IP 地址和数据包等技术细节。这种方法挑战了计算机科学教育的传统课程。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#what- humanities-scholars-want-students-to-know-about-the-internet" target="_blank">;[summary] </a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36810112" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;No-more-secrets：重现 1992 年电影《运动鞋》中的解密效果</stitle>; <id>;https://github。 com/bartobri/no-more-secrets</id>; <更新>;2023-07-20T13:50:14.691139Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com/bartobri/no-more-secrets"/>; <作者>; <name>;tambourine_man</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=tambourine_man</uri>; </author>; <content type=" html">;<img src="https://camo.githubusercontent.com/68bbd6c555003c61a5e865edaf317f370a7b35544abb59a85ce179fde58f626f/68747470733a2f2f7777772e627269616e626172746f2 e696e666f2f7374617469632f6e6d732f6e6d732e676966”样式=“宽度：220px; height: 125px;" />;<br />;该项目提供了一个名为 nms 的命令行工具，它重现了 1992 年黑客电影 Sneakers 中屏幕上出现的著名数据解密效果。它适用于管道数据，显示加密数据，然后显示原始纯文本字符。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#no-more-secrets-recreate-the-decryption-effect-seen-in-the-1992- movie-sneakers" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36799776" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
